EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbonomic Community Appreciation Kings vs Canadiens
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-vs-canadiens/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on October 18th, as the Los Angeles Kings take on the Montreal Canadiens. We're expecting a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, hockey. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry. Los Angeles Kings vs Montreal Canadiens <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-vs-canadiens/]]>
Where: Staples Center 1111 S. Figueroa, Los Angeles, CA 90015 Wednesday, October 18th 7:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/los-angeles-community-appreciation-kings-vs-canadiens/]]>
We hope to see you there.
- The Turbonomic Team
